Name: ABYSS CRAWLERS plus　迷宮クロウラ＋
About the game: * Game * Roguelike platformer game. A little girl Lily explores around the dungeon with beating monsters. Let's beat the monsters with robot, sword, gun and trained body. * Synopsis * Due to the Great War, human being had to shift their living place to the underground towns they have created. However, the underground society is now about to self-destruct. The protagonist heads to the above-ground world, through the dungeon filled with monsters. > skill tree > item: shield, bomb Pixel-based animations contained.
